definition: see 眾所周知|众所周知[zhong4 suo3 zhou1 zhi1]
abbr. for 眾議院|众议院[Zhong4 yi4 yuan4], House of Representatives
actually/place/classifier for houses, small buildings, institutions etc/that which/particle introducing a relative clause or passive/CL:個|个[ge4]
to make a circuit/to circle/circle/circumference/lap/cycle/complete/all/all over/thorough/to help financially

sentences.english: It is well-known that lung cancer is caused at least in part by smoking too much.
sentences.chinese: 众所周知，肺癌至少部分是由于吸烟过多引起的。

sentences.english: Photo taken at Buddha Park, also known as Wat Xieng Khuan 25 km southeast from Vientiane.
sentences.chinese: 在佛公园摄，也寺昆万象25公里东南众所周知的。

sentences.english: It is well-known that cancer at least partly caused by over smoking.
sentences.chinese: 众所周知，肺癌至少部分地是由于吸烟过多引起的。

sentences.english: As is well known, we students are the future masters of the nation.
sentences.chinese: 如众所周知，我们学生都是国家未来的主人翁。

sentences.english: It is well-known that life is not always smooth.
sentences.chinese: 众所周知，生活并不总是顺顺利利的。

sentences.english: It is a fore-runner of China's reform and opening-up.
sentences.chinese: 众所周知，深圳是中国改革开放的先驱和样板。

sentences.english: The propitiatory system of the Jews is well known.
sentences.chinese: 犹太人的安抚体系是众所周知的。

sentences.english: It is known especially for its motion-picture, aeronautics, and aerospace industries.
sentences.chinese: 尤其是因电影，航空，航天工业等而众所周知。

sentences.english: She visited the country intentionally as it has very beautiful scenes.
sentences.chinese: 众所周知这个国家风景很美，她是特地去的。

sentences.english: Australian sheep placenta is known to be one of the best.
sentences.chinese: 众所周知，澳大利亚羊胎素是最好的羊胎素之一。

sentences.english: Of course there is a well-known dark side to contemporary street rap.
sentences.chinese: 当然，现代街道对话有一个众所周知的阴暗面。

sentences.english: Croatia is well-known for its preserved environment and unspoilt surroundings.
sentences.chinese: 克罗地亚是众所周知的完好的环境和未受破坏的环境。

sentences.english: Raziel is officially known as the Chief of the Supreme Mysteries.
sentences.chinese: 拉吉尔是众所周知最高的神秘主宰。

sentences.english: The reason that he told me is well-known.
sentences.chinese: 他告诉我的原因是众所周知的。

sentences.english: As everyone knows, Australia is entirely peopled with criminals.
sentences.chinese: 众所周知，澳大利亚是一个罪犯之国。

definition: in fact/in reality/actually/as a matter of fact/de facto/ipso facto
variant of 是[shi4]/(used in given names)
in the past always/for a long time now/until now
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
in fact/in reality/as a matter of fact/in practice
from this, it can be seen that...
(emphasizes that sth is precisely or exactly as stated)/precisely/exactly/even/if/just like/in the same way as
